ticket.name: [CSS] - change scene

ticket.name: [Logic] - linked tickets
ticket.description: In logic: - ThreadTicket could extends TicketList and Ticket. - This way we could reference other ticket in one ticket. - You could see the completion of all ticket from a thread.

ticket.name: [Logic] - Author
ticket.description: Add an author class to trace the author of each individual tickets.

ticket.name: [bug] - new project column
ticket.description:
when project is created, column container are not set on board.
To generate this bug: - new project - add columns - create - create new ticket - start ticket from queue
